code: import _toConsumableArray from"D:/mobilecross/Ajege/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";import{Store}from"pullstate";export var CartStore=new Store({total:0,product_ids:[]});export var addToCart=function addToCart(categorySlug,productID){CartStore.update(function(s){s.product_ids=[].concat(_toConsumableArray(s.product_ids),["".concat(categorySlug,"/").concat(parseInt(productID))]);});};export var removeFromCart=function removeFromCart(productIndex){CartStore.update(function(s){s.product_ids.splice(productIndex,1);});};
